change.title: Introduce material set
change.description: A Material Set must contain a bundle of material frequently used, a configuration of dive equipment. The use of a material set should make possible to select multiple materials at once for a dive
change.resolution: The material sets configuration are available in the Mat Cave. In the equipment panel of the dive, the use of a material set is possible.

change.title: Logbook Report extra values
change.description: Add extra values for each dive
change.resolution: Extra property in the report wizard to add dive details (purpose, platform, type).

change.title: Jasper report 4.7.1
change.description: Use the new version of Jasper report
change.resolution: Done

change.title: Map panel
change.description: The map panel doesn't work well.
change.resolution: Used a new framework (from Open Street Maps instead of a SwingX-WS component)

change.title: Wizards layout
change.description: Standardize the layout of the wizard using the WizardPanel
change.resolution: Done for Config wizard, Import wizard, Export wizard

change.title: Component for coordinates
change.description: With a spinner, the value can never be null, meaning you can't reset a coordinate
change.resolution: Used textfield instead of spinner. added a button to clear the coordinates.

change.title: New name of a tag in the surrogate file
change.description: Replace 'document_divelocation' by 'document_divesite'.
change.resolution: Done

change.title: Recover a surrogate file
change.description: Check whether the surrogate file is present or not and recreate a new one if necessary
change.resolution: Done

change.title: Bug in the configuration
change.description: A problem occurs in some case during the configuration (surrogate keys file not created)
change.resolution: Bug fixed.

change.title: Stat panel view
change.description: Only available if a logbook is selected. This ain't logic. The viewer should always be accessible; it must be filled when a logbook is selected.
change.resolution: Always accessible now.

change.title: Equipment panel null values
change.description: Some values appears as "null"
change.resolution: done.

change.title: XML Parsers refactoring
change.description: Refactoring of the parsers make them extend the same Absrtact class
change.resolution: done.

change.title: XML Version converter
change.description: Problem when a succession of conversion occurs.
change.resolution: The conversion of the XML is based now on the XML document and not on the Inpustream anymore.

change.title: Divers: new attributes
change.description: Add the birthdate and contact informations.
change.resolution: Birthdate added. Contact informations added (email, phone and mobile)

change.title: RXTX libs for Linux
change.description: Since the version 2.2, the linux libs for RXTX where not archived anymore in the zip file.
change.resolution: They are now present again. Just wonder why dind't anybody see it... Am I the only suer of this application???

change.title: Statistics modified
change.description: Use a wizard for statistics and make it extensible for the future. Also integrate the panel in the docking framework.
change.resolution: Integration done. Wizards done. Basic wizard options are developped. Many parameters could be used to produce statistics. Just develop now...

change.title: Console logging orientation
change.description: Console doesn't append new event when logging at the bottom after max row size is reached.
change.resolution: Condition when removing a line depending on the "log on top" property

change.title: JFreechart
change.description: Use the new version (1.0.14).
change.resolution: done

change.title: Gaz Mix Switch time on profile
change.description: On the profile panel, there must be a way to display the gaz mixes.
change.resolution: The gaz mix are visible when selecting the option on the panel

change.title: Dive surface time to seconds
change.description: Modifying the dive surface time to seconds
change.resolution: done

change.title: Local Proxy settings
change.description: The proxy settings used must be the local one's
change.resolution: Local Proxy settings loaded at startup.

change.title: Dialog standardisation
change.description: Some "YES-NO" Dialog should have the same behaviour and the same layout.
change.resolution: Many Dialogs have been refactored to extend the PromptDialog class.

change.title: Countries translation
change.description: Not every country is translated in the Bundle files
change.resolution: Done for French

change.title: Map Component
change.description: Every time the map should be displayed, it should occur in a central dockable component.
change.resolution: A new dockable component is created. It's shown when required (ex: click on button in some panels). Only the map used to pick up pin points are loaded in separated dialogs (ex: Dive site editor)

change.title: Browser popup menu
change.description: Popup dissapears when moving the mouse after right-click on the browser
change.resolution: Fixed. This was due to a mouse events badly interpreted.

change.title: JtB import Export format
change.description: Problems using this format under Windows (for documents)
change.resolution: Fixed. This is due to the filepath separator char in zip file; only "/" are interpreted, independently from the OS

change.title: Tooltips in the console
change.description: Tooltips didn't work (on every line of the console)
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Order in the console
change.description: the boolean is interpretted as the inverse of what it should be
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Use of Jasperreports 4.5.1
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Report modification
change.description: Extra values of the dive must be included.
change.resolution: Added dive purpose, type and platform if desired (selected as option when printing the report).

change.title: Dive site address
change.description: Adding an address to a dive site.
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Dive time modification
change.description: When modifying a dive time, the dive profile and the switchtime of the dive tanks must be adapted.
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Dive purpose and type components
change.description: Height of the components has to be reviewed.
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Save dive when closing a logbook
change.description: When closing a logbook, opening a logbook or creating a new one, a dialog must prompt (as when closing the application) to save the modified dives.
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Download dive progress bar
change.description: The layout of the progress dialog when downloading dives from a dive computer isn't pretty.
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Euro symbol in the material panel
change.description: Symbol doens't display correctly
change.resolution: replaced by "euros"

change.title: Layout for Material edition dialog
change.description: Review the layout because the scroll is automatically activated in the General panel
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Missing bundle entries
change.description: 3 bundle entries are missing: camera, videocamera and lead
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Dive Site detail panel : units
change.description: The detail panel only adapts the units of the values, but not the values themselves when changing the preferences.
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Units in logbook informations panel
change.description: The data aren't depending on the selected units.
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Date formats
change.description: The format of the date can be choosen by the user in the preferences.
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Volume unit
change.description: To fulfill some UDDF specifications, a m3 volume is required.
change.resolution: Done. There is no possibility to use this volume as preference yet.

change.title: Frame position / size
change.description: The frame should maintain the size and position from one opening to another.
change.resolution: Done. The parameters are saved into the user preferences.

change.title: Material matching panel (import)
change.description: Some buggy behaviour in this panel when selecting the "match" check box.
change.resolution: This panel has been reviewed and a super class is created to have the same behaviour for the different matching panels (divers ans dive sites)

change.title: Revision xsl order
change.description: Revision xsl doesn't guarantee the order of the changes (based on the ID number)
change.resolution: done

change.title: Some enums must appear in list according to a specific order (independent from the language)
keyed catalogs (enums) must appear in the alphabetical order in lists
change.resolution: Some are done. further adaptations can be changed when encountered.

change.title: dive type, purpose and platform don't update when switching language
change.resolution: Solved

change.title: Gazmix dialog
change.description: the gazmix dialog doesn't prompt anymore when editing the mix (in the equipment panel of the dive)
change.resolution: Solved

change.title: Search Panel
change.description: New Panel to perform some dive search following criterias
change.resolution: Search criterias are : number, platform, dive type, dive purpose, dive time, depth, dive site, date, diver

change.title: Material Edition
change.description: New way to edit the material of the Mat cave. Problems when changing units or language.
change.resolution: Material is displayed using HTML rendering and edited in apart dialog

change.title: Building scripts
change.description: the project architecture has been a little bit reviewed
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Preferences box
change.description: the General Preferences node must be directly show the panel instead of "No preference here"
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Export jtb format
change.description: Uses a temp file to build the compressed archive. This should happen at once without a temp folder but directly using the Zip api
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Delete logbook
change.description: The possibility to delete a logbook must exist
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Logbook information panel
change.description: Create a panel with logbook useful data
change.resolution: Done, panel can be accessed via a new docking panel.

change.title: Update notifications
change.description: Can be useful to know whether a new version is available.
change.resolution: Done, but requires some extra actions on the web page of the project on source forge when deploying a new release.

change.title: New user preferences
change.description: Some new user preferences are required: default data comm interface and default dive computer
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: No language loaded
change.description: If the software file has a path containing white spaces, it can't load the languages
change.resolution: The method to load the languages has been reviewed.

change.title: Datacomm interface component
change.description: create a new component for the data communication with the dive computer
change.resolution: A new component is created and more souple in case of extension.

change.title: Logbook analysis
change.description: Find a way to show logbook common values (max depht, cumulated dite times, etc...)
change.resolution: A Dialog appears when clicking on the Information button of the browser

change.title: Close method
change.description: Sometimes the application doesn't close properly (when closing the window with the cross).
change.resolution: Closing process reviewed.

change.title: Import from binaries
change.description: Nothing imported when using the binaries format.
change.resolution: Binaries Format wasn't treated in the action.

change.title: Dive sites in report
change.description: Possibility to have the dive sites in the report.
change.resolution: done

change.title: Material Listing
change.description: There must be a possibility to register all the material of the diver.
change.resolution: This is done by adding a "Mat Cave" where you can manage all your material. Aside this, the equipment used during the dive should be a subset of the Materials, so there is a reference possible from the equipment to the material. The equipment holds the specific data of the referenced material coming from the dive (for example: begin and end pressure in a dive tank). Material that can be managed is: dive tanks, dive computers, fins, masks, weight belts.

change.title: Dive Criterias
change.description: Some criterias are required to be registered like purpose of the dive.
change.resolution: The criterias that can now be registered are: purpose of the dive, type of dive and platform.

change.title: New units
change.description: Need of other units especially for Pressure and length.
change.resolution: New units added for lengths (feet) and pressure (Pascal and psi)

change.title: LogBook default sorting
change.description: This must be a user preference
change.resolution: The default sorting is a user preference (configurable in the preference panel). The property is stored in the preference file and the sorting is the default one when opening a logbook for the first time (only the first time)

change.title: Bugs/change number in revision file
change.resolution: The number of bugfixes/changes are now shown in the revision screen (html)

change.title: Dive Rating
change.resolution: A rating between 0 and 10 is possible

change.title: Date Component for dive
change.description: New date component doesn't register the date properly.
change.resolution: Solved by adding an ActionListener on the component instead of a PropertyChangeListener.

change.title: Documents for Dive sites
change.description: Dive sites need sometimes extra documents (picture for example)
change.resolution: Documents can be added to a dive site using the dive site manager. Those Documents are also available in the dive site detail panel.

change.title: Import Wizard
change.description: The import tool must be in the form of a wizard.
change.resolution: The import wizard has been totally reviewed. This is the biggest change of the version. Supported formats are jtb (proprietary), jtbb (proprietary format for dive computer stream sequence), UDDF (3.0.0), UDCF.

change.title: 3 new gazes
change.description: Argon, Neon and Hydrogen have been added.
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Save before exit
change.description: When closing the application, a dialog must be prompted to tell wheter the modified dives must be saved or not.
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: Console log level
change.description: The console doesn't display the the current level of the logger
change.resolution: Done.

change.title: dive tank gaz mix
change.description: An indication of volume % should be present to know why the OK button is enabled or disabled.
change.resolution: Done. Volume % is present, in red when != 100% (otherwise in green).

change.title: dive tank gaz mix
change.description: When a change occurs in the gazmix of the dive tank panel, it ain't repercuted in the model.
change.resolution: Done. Model is adapted when a change occurs in the GUI.

change.title: Report
change.description: Report must contain the url of the software anywhere
change.resolution: Done. Url is under the print date on each page.

change.title: Dive max depth
change.description: The model isn't coherent as the profile depths are negative and the max depth of the dive is positive.
change.resolution: Model has been modified to automatically set the depth negative when using the setter. Graphical component has been modified consequently; UDCF import and export too

change.title: UDCF export
change.description: Problem with the gaz mix: 1.composition comparison is not working properly 2.problem with the decimal of the %age of the gazes.
change.resolution: 2 problems fixed.

change.title: Dive Document Slideshow
change.description: Nullpointer when the document has been added to the dive and not saved yet.
change.resolution: The used SlideWalker now checks wheter the document has a not null content. If so, it loads the content using the logbookmanagerfacade.

change.title: Update Logbook data
change.description: Nullpointer in case of update a logbook without a diver (owner).
change.resolution: This bug is fixed

change.title: Stat panel, order of lists
change.description: In the stat panel, the lists (years, divers, divesites) are not sorted naturally.
change.resolution: This bug is fixed

change.title: Divesite chooser
change.description: The dive site chooser component must have the same behaviour as the diver chooser (enter in search field, dialog that opens with good criterias, etc.)
change.resolution: This bug is fixed

change.title: Dive Document
change.description: When a document has a problem with content loading, it can't be removed properly from the dive.
change.resolution: This bug is fixed

change.title: Export Wizard
change.description: The export tool must be in the form of a wizard.
change.resolution: The export wizard has been totally reviewed. Supported formats are jtb (proprietary), UDDF (3.0.0), UDCF.

change.title: Stats Panel
change.description: The stat panel must be docked as the other ones.
change.resolution: The stat panel doesn't prompt in a JDialog anymore but appears in the docking frames aside the document editor. The Observer pattern is implemented to be notified of what happens in the model.

change.title: Current Dive deletion
change.description: The possibility to delete the current dive must exist.
change.resolution: Done. A new button has been created to do it. Attention, the button has the icon of the previous "cancel changes" icon. So now the "Cancel changes" button has a new icon too (eraser)

change.title: Browser Selection Behaviour
change.description: The behaviour of the mouse clicks (left and right) isn't fully correct and must be reviewed for some actions (when right click near a node in the tree)
change.resolution: done

change.title: Multiple Deletion
change.description: The possibility to delete more dives at once must exist
change.resolution: Done. With a beautiful dive selection dialog.

change.title: Logbook Selection
change.description: When opening a logbook, the selection should be possible by pressing ENTER on a selected line.
change.resolution: done

change.title: Dive profile editor
change.description: A tool for encoding the dive profile is needed.
change.resolution: A basic editor is now present. The profile can be edited by filling a table.

change.title: Dive site: Map
change.description: A map must be accessible if the dive site has coordinates.
change.resolution: The map is available in the dive site detail panel. Open street is used in a specific panel. Also a web page using google maps can be opened in the default browser. For both maps, an internet connection must be available.

change.title: Home Panel with basic menus
change.resolution: New Home panel available. This is the basic panel when no layout is set.

change.title: Profile in report
change.description: Some warnings weren't displayed in the image of the profile in the report. Colors must also match the graph in the editor.

change.title: List of revisions
change.description: A better list of changes and bugfixes must be provided.
change.resolution: XML + XSL has been used to display the revision list for all the versions. The layout is poor, but there is no need for a better one for the moment

change.title: Position index of material in a list
change.resolution: The order index can be set on an equipment and is modifiable in the equipment tab. The index take in count the other indexes.

change.title: Dive tank equipment : start/finish pressure + volume : set units
change.resolution:
1. Dive tanks have now pressure in double instead of int
2. Units on the components are automatically updated when switching the units in the preferences.

change.title: Use a class that notifies all the UI events like selecting a diver or a divesite.
change.resolution: This can be considered as done, but further evolutions will certainly come with new requirements.

change.title: include dive pictures in report if checked in the report dialog
change.resolution: done

change.title: Deco entries in profile not visible
change.description: The deco entries series in the graph was filled with the deco ceiling warning data.

change.title: document viewer detachable / slide show
change.resolution: A "Slide show" dialog is implemented and accessible from the documents of the dives

change.title: export into standard format (UDDF? UDCF? DL7?)
change.resolution: Implemented UDDF and UDCF but no possibility to really test it... some bugs can appear.

change.title: Logging Console
change.description: The backround of the level combobox has same color as the console
change.resolution: done

change.title: Tasks pane
change.description: When the task pane is opened and a task is running, this last must be diplayed.
change.resolution: Panel filled in the constructor

change.title: Docking panel loading
change.description: The dockable panels must be instantiated only if necessary and not all of them at the beginning.
change.resolution: Resolved by changing the docking framework used.

change.title: Dive site: geolocalisation (coordinates)
change.description: A dive site must have coordinates
change.resolution: Coordinates can now be saved for a divesite.

change.title: Detail panel for diver
change.resolution: The panel is very basic, but don't need to display more for the moment

change.title: Console: copy to clipboard copies the real message, not the toString() of the log event
Dive gazes panel
change.description: button "Edit" ==> change icon
change.resolution: done

change.title: layout for the name of logbook in browser modified
translation of JTables when switching language
Dive gazes panel
change.description: smaller width in dive tank panel
change.resolution: done

change.title: all
change.description: translations for "palanquee" merge dive site dialog has some translation problems libraries for linux 64 bits integrated into the project (rxtx)

change.title: all
change.description: Run application under open_jdk JRE. There's a problem using the Wizard framework.

change.title: all
change.description: panel names shorter manage divelocation picture (merge divelocations) integrate a picture for divelocation (management part) hour when importing a dive : bug? delete dive with id -1: doesn't work dive gazes component material: save, update, ... user preference : length unit tree for equipment granularity for save/update : dive? or logbook? cancel edition of a dive logbook metadata => save add equipment report: problem with some titles report: profile surround with border layout profile panel alignments labels dive editor icones merge dive / merge diver user preference change persistency type (configuration) report: add saturation index after dive file selectionchooser: better code stats : colors print report: choose language merge divelocation merge divers rapport: comment est répété si palanquée est splittée nouvelle plongée: date pas réinitialisée rapport: traduction de "divers" rapport: palanquée est splitée Ctrl + S : action SAVE tab: save before closing. Automatic language in function of bundles options import - auto-number delete dive translate all that remains (especially tables) wizard for DB configuration dive gazes dive profile table for dive location table for Diver dive location chooser diver chooser : first and last name selection renderer for dives in the browser
